Title: Establishes the New York quality undergraduate academic and learning integration for incarcerated individuals (NY-QUALIFIIs) commission
Summary: Establishes the New York quality undergraduate academic and learning integration for incarcerated individuals (NY-QUALIFIIs) commission, which focuses on providing higher education learning to incarcerated individuals.
LawCode: Add §210-d, Ed L; add §6, amd §§5 & 15-b, Cor L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the correction law, in relation to establishing the New York quality undergraduate academic and learning integration for incarcerated individuals (NY-QUALIFIIs) commission
